name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Stevenson Leon ROSE, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Stevenson Leon ROSE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of July, 2014, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as framed by the Commonwealth, is as follows:
Whether the Superior Court erred in concluding, as a matter of first impression, that [Respondent] was entitled to a reduced punishment under the ex post facto clause for a murder that he had yet to commit when the law was changed to increase the punishment prior to the victim’s death?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
95 A.3d 274
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Stevenson Leon ROSE, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 8, 2014.
